<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete Resource List</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/v1/resource_list/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the resource list that has the specified ID.

## Request

successful operation

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

invalid_id / non_existing_resource_list_id / resource_list_assigned_to_user_role / resource_list_assigned_to_policy_scan_config

non_existing_resource_list_id

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"409"} value={"409"}><div>

conflict_deleting_last_compute_access_group_for_alert_rule
